metadata.title: CVE-2012-6060 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the dissect_iscsi_pdu function inepan/dissectors/packet-iscsi.c in the iSCSI dissector in Wireshark 1.6.xbefore 1.6.12 and 1.8.x before 1.8.4 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (infinite loop) via a malformed packet.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6060` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwireshark5 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwiretap4 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
libwsutil4 - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
tshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-common - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
wireshark-qt - 1.12.1+g01b65bf-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.1+g01b65bf-2').
